Html:
I am attempting to download the 2007 Redaction Add-in that is supposed to be compatible with 2010. So far I haven't been able to get any download to start.

I accidentally clicked on a download for a Free Download Manager and quickly canceled that. I do not want to install any extra junk, I'm just trying to install this single, simple add-in.

Please provide instructions for downloading and installing this add-in with Word 2010.

Yes, the same thing happened when I tried to download. Then I turned to this guide for Word Redaction, looks promising enough for me. :)

Best regards,
Derek

Word 2007/2010 Redaction Tool - Word Annotation

Directly download this add-in from Downloads part.
